list.abs: improvement in culture and observation experiment on paramecium ., 对草履虫培养和观察实验的改进.
this essay regards paramecium as research object , sets up a way of gather , culture and separating paramecium effectively by using the Water-bath .本文以草履虫为研究对象，建立了一套采集、培养并自主创新使用水槽电极分离法来高效分离出草履虫的方法。
翻译词汇 ... Paragonismus westermani 卫氏并殖吸虫 Paramecium caudatum 尾草履虫 parathyroid hormone,parathyrin 甲状旁腺素.

list.exp: 纤毛虫纲代表种有草履虫
list.abs: 最熟悉的纤毛虫纲代表种有草履虫（Paramecium caudatum）及四膜虫（Tetrahymena）。纤毛虫类的最外表有一层表膜，有的种类 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek paramēkēs 'oval' from para- 'against' + mēkos 'length'
